caption.title: Inhibitory effects of vegetable oil blend (VOB) on intracellular superoxide anion production in lipopolysaccharide (LPS)-activated RAW 264.7 cells using the colorimetric NBT assay. Gallic acid (GA) was used as positive control. The level of superoxide anion in control cells was arbitrarily reported as zero. Data are reported as meansÂ±SE of triplicate experiments. *P<0.05 compared with LPS-treated cells. #P<0.05 compared with control (ANOVA and the Tukey's post-hoc test).
